name: Rita's Adventure
description:
A game that I made for my ex-girlfriend once, who's a huge fan of Hamtaro and The Lion King.  In this game, her Hamtaro OC, "Rita," gets turned human-sized and she must go together with her companion, Simba from The Lion King, to stop Fuzzy Lumpkins from The Powerpuff Girls from turning everyone into meat.

There's a few side-quests and such at the end btw, such as the lost forest (or whatever it was called.)  The cover art is by mhgentry.  Be sure to save often.
